body.p: In this example, the entity specified at inception of the contract that its commitment under the contract is to credit interest to the policyholder account balances at a rate equal to the return on a specified pool of assets minus two percentage points. Because of the entity’s decision at the end of Year 2, this spread decreased from two percentage points to one percentage point.
